divs: sighting detailswe were in our driveway when my husband noticed a very bright light in the distance. it was kind of low in the sky. we were wondering what it could possibly be. too bright to be a planet\star or moon. maybe a plane? we stared for about 4 min. and it did not move at all. i was then getting very curious. i went in the house to get my video camera. when i came out i started recording. it then started to move a little and turn? not sure how to describe... the more i zoomed, the more it glared and then i started to notice it moving., so i would zoom out and just try to let the camera focus. it seemed to break into 2 lights then started changing colors. i noticed the colors red and green. the shape appeared to change, but now i'm wondering if maybe it was turning or something? it almost seemed to turn into a glowing ball at one point. it was the craziest thing we have ever seen. it kept getting out of our sight behing a rooftop, and we kept moving to see it. it finally got smaller and took off quickly. i have to say, i was a little concerned it might know i was video taping it. i have never really put much thought into ufo's before this.
